content: उद्धृ {vI.v} {c1c} {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To draw out, raise up. {@--2@} To save, deliver; भगवति तव स्पृष्टानद्भिश्चिरादुददीधरत् <ls>U. 1. 23.</ls> {vII.v} [उद्-हृ] {@--1@} To draw or take out, extract, extricate; शरं… उद्धर्तुमैच्छत् <ls>R. 2. 30</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 64</ls>; to deliver from, relieve of, save, rescue, protect (with <ab>abl.</ab>); मां तावदुद्धर शुचो दयिताप्रवृत्त्या <ls>V. 4. 15</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 358</ls>; <ls>Bg. 6. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To uproot, extirpate, eradicate; tear or pull out; नमयामास नृपाननुद्धरन् <ls>R. 8. 9</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 66</ls>; त्रिदिवमुद्धृतदानवकंटकं <ls>Ś. 7. 3</ls>; <ls>Mv. 3. 13</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 22</ls>; उद्धरणीये चक्षुषी <ls>Dk. 102.</ls> {@--3@} To pluck up (flowers &c.); <ls>K. 21</ls>, <ls n="K.">144.</ls> {@--4@} To raise, lift up, elevate, extend (as hands); पातयितुमेव शक्तिर्नान्नपिटमुद्धर्तुं <ls>Pt. 1. 363</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 62</ls>; <ls>V. 4. 34.</ls> {@--5@} To take up, absorb (water); <ls>R. 4. 66</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 75.</ls> {@--6@} To sustain, bear up; राज्यधुरमुद्धर्तुं <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--7@} To separate, abstract. {@--8@} To remove, put away. {@--9@} To deduct, subtract. {@--10@} To select, pick out; <ls>Ms. 9. 116.</ls> {@--11@} To present, offer; <ls>Y. 1. 159.</ls> {@--12@} To prove; <ls>Y. 2. 28.</ls> {@--13@} To divide (as with partners). {@--14@} To publish, make known. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to extract or draw out; <ls>R. 9. 78.</ls>
